Me and my life...

Hi there! I am Afzal Ahmad. I recently graduated from IIT Guwahati, India with a bachelor's in Electrical Engineering. I am currently working as a research assistant at the Multi-Robot Systems lab, CTU, Prague.

I love working with robots. My interest lies in multi-robot intelligence and coordination and to bring this technology to real life. I have worked on swarm robotics at MIST lab, Polytechnique Montreal. I also worked with Prof. Indrani Kar on developing a multi-robot planning and coordination method. You can visit the projects page for more details.

I love to discuss about new ideas and technologies. Especially in the field of Robotics and A.I. If you want to get in touch, just drop me an email.
